subject: Dear Sir/ Madam,
body:
Dear Sir/ Madam,
Are you a resident in South Africa, and owing between R200,000.00 to R2,000,000.00, on Personal or Business loans?
Our Debt Mediation team will settle your accounts within 14 days, without upfront fees, after a full valuation on your account is made and condition of settlement is agreed upon.
Send us an Email to: 
DebtMediationTeam@aol.com

subject: Re: Dear Sir/ Madam,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. Your offer sounds quite interesting! I'm curious, how does your Debt Mediation team manage to settle accounts within days? That seems like a very quick turnaround time. Also, could you please explain more about the process of full valuation on an account?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Glenn
